name: Pong (itch) (anh.lee)
description:
A simple Pong game with high degree of customization. Play by yourself or with a friend and enjoy the ability to choose your favorite layout, such as a simple white map or a popping green one, among other settings.

Controls

W and S to move the paddle for Player 1.

Up and Down Arrow to move the paddle for Player 2.

ESC or P to pause the game.

Credits

Anh Le (Programmer)
